title: ‘We Know There’s a Gap’: Ineos Grenadiers Admits Falling Behind as Pogačar, Vingegaard Dominate Tour de France
content:
Analysis: For a team that was once so far ahead of the game, Ineos Grenadiers is behind the curve. After 5 years without a Tour victory, can cycling's first 'super team' catch up?

Read the full article at ‘We Know There’s a Gap’: Ineos Grenadiers Admits Falling Behind as Pogačar, Vingegaard Dominate Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
